subject: Ready to plunder - FilePlanet Pirates special
body:
Pirates of the Caribbean Online on FilePlanet





















        FilePlanet - 3 monthsonly $9.95
		

			Go ahead and plunder FilePlanet. Get our quarterly FilePlanet subscription at only $9.95. This is a 38% savings over the current subscription.
			
			Make sure you don't miss all the great exclusive betas coming up, plus some cool pirate games we have for you.
			• Pirates of the Caribbean
			    Online Beta (coming soon)
			• Puzzle Pirates
			• Pirate Hunter Demo
			• Escape from monkey island
			    demo












			So come check out all the great
			stuff you can pirate off of
			FilePlanet today.
